titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation against frauds and deceits vsed in draperie, and for discouerie and preuenting of the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Regulation for dyeing, weaving, etc. to remedy defects in statures and to be enforced by commissioners until the next parliament.--STC.
There is apparently a line or two of text missing at the end of sheet 3--STC.
Dated at end: VVestminster: the sixteenth day of April, in the ninth yeere of the reigne of our souereigne Lord Charles ...
Arms 24; Steele notation: and Peace 2) Maie- 3) Clothiers, 4) the 5) by contrary.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
